1 Fold in half to make a crease and fold back. 2 Fold in half.
3 Fold in the dotted line. 4 Turn over.
5 Fold in the dotted line. 6 Fold in half.
7 Cut in lines with a pair of scissors. 8 Open.
Finished
1 Fold in half. 2 Fold in half.
3 Open the ^ part. 4 Flatten.
5 Turn Over. 6 Open the ^ part and flatten.
7 Fold to meet the center line. 8 Fold inside in the dotted line.
9 Turn over. 10 Fold as much as 5 ~ 7.
11 Fold back is the same. 12 Fold inside back is the same.
Finished bottom.
1 Fold to make a crease and fold back. 2 Fold to meet the center line.
3 Fold in the dotted line. 4 Turn over. 5 Folds a little in center line.
6 Same four one is made and piled up. 7 Sets it in the upper part.
1 Fold in half. 2 Fold in the dotted line to make a crease. 3 Fold in the dotted line to make a crease.
4 Fold to reach the star to the other one. 5 Fold in the dotted line.
6 Fold in the dotted line. 7 Fold backward in the dotted line.
8 Cut with a pair of scissors. 9 Open.
10 Fold to make a crease and fold back. 11 Fold to make a crease and fold back.
1 Fold in half to make a crease and fold back. 2 Fold backward in the dotted line.
3 Fold in the dotted lines to meet the center line. 4 Fold in the dotted line.
5 Fold to make a crease and unfold. 6 Fold to make a crease and unfold.
7 Open the pocket from ^ and flatten. 8 Fold in the dotted line.
9 Fold in the dotted line. 10 Pocked fold in the dotted lines.
11 Fold both sides inside. 12 Turn around.
1 Fold in half to make a crease and unfold. 2 Fold in the dotted lines to meet the center line.
3 Fold to make creases and fold back. 4 Fold in the dotted lines. 5 Fold in the dotted lines.
6 Step fold in the dotted line. 7 Fold in the dotted lines. 8 Turn over.
9 Fold in the dotted line. 10 Fold in the dotted line.
11 Fold in the dotted lines. 12 Turn over.
Draw face and finished.
1 Fold to make creases and unfold. 2 Fold in forward in the dotted line.
3 Turn over. 4 Roll up.
5 Fold forward in the dotted line. 6 Fold backward in the dotted line.
1 Fold in the dotted line. 2 Fold in the dotted line.
3 Open. 4 Turn over.
5 Fold to meet the center. 6 Fold in the dotted line.
7 Open. 8 Turn over.
9 Fold in the dotted line. 10 Fold to meet the center line.
11 Open. 12 Inserts it.
1 Fold in half.
2 Fold to make a crease and unfold. 3 Step fold forward in the dotted lines. 4 Fold in the dotted lines.
5 Fold in the dotted lines. 6 Fold in the dotted lines. 7 Turn over.
8 Fold inside. 9 Fold backward in the dotted lines.
Fold in half and finished.
1 Fold in half and fold back. 2 Fold in the gray lines to meet in the center line.
3 Fold in the gray lines to meet the center line. 4 Fold in half. 5 Fold in the gray line.
6 Fold in the gray lines to meet the center line. 7 Fold to make crease and fold back.
8 Open the pockets from ^ and fold to right. 9 Fold backwards in the gray line.
Draw eyes and finished.
How to Play.
1 Fold in half to make crease. 2 Fold in half.
3 Fold to make crease and fold back. 4 Fold to make crease and fold back. 5 Fold in the lines.
6 Fold in the gray line. 7 Fold in the grey lines to meet the center. 8 Fold in the gray line.
9 Fold in the gray line and fold back. 10 Pull out the corners.
11 Fold in the gray line. 12 Fold in the gray line.
13 Fold in the gray line. 14 Turn over.
Hold with a finger and release to jump.
1 Fold in the gray line to meet the center line.
2 Fold in half to make crease and fold back.
3 Fold in the gray lines and fold back.
4 Open the pockets from ^ and flatten to triangle.
5 Fold in the gray line.
6 Tuck the edges into to pocket.
7 Fold backward in the gray lines.
8 Turn over. 9 Fold backward into the gray lines.
1 Fold to meet the center line. 2 Turn over.
3 Fold to meet the center line. 4 Turn over.
5 Fold in half. 6 Open the ^ part and flatten.
7 Turn over. 8 Open the ^ part and flatten.
9 Makes it to the cross. 10 Turn over.
11 Picks up and it lets it out.
1 Fold in half to make a crease and unfold. 2 fold in half.
3 Fold in the grey line. 4 Fold in the gray line. 5 Open the pocket from ^ and flatten.
6 Fold backward in the gray line. 7 Hood pocket in the gray line. 8 Fold in the gray line.
9 Fold in the gray line. 10 Turn over.
11 Pocket fold in the dotted line. 12 Pocket fold in the dotted line.
1 Fold in half to make crease and fold back. 2 Fold in the dotted lines to meet the center lines.
3 Turn over. 4 Fold in the dotted lines to meet the center lines.
5 Fold in half. 6 Fold in half.
7 Flatten to square. 8 Turn over.
9 Flatten to square. 10 Open.
11 Let both thubs and index fingers in. 12 Draw face and finished.

2 Fold in the grey line.

1 Fold to meet the center line.
2 Turn over.
3 Fold to meet the center line.
4 Open the part.
5 Fold in the gray line.
6 Fold in half.

3 Fold to meet the center line. 4 Fold in the gray line.

2 Fold to meet the center line.
